name: Track and Field (itch)
description:
Description:

Run/Mash as fast as you can in Track and Field! As you can probably guess, your objective is to beat your opponent in a footrace. The player who finishes first is declared the winner.

Controls

Player 1: Right Arrow Key- Move

Player 2: Z- Move

Feel free to leave any feedback in the comments!

(Made for the Fast addicting games Jam by @dragex)
